verbs.description: Presidential summits [V: can] be tricky . Kennedy 's weakness when he met Khrushchev led to the Cuban Missile Crisis . Nixon 's historic visit to China effectively accepted Mao 's regime as a nuclear state . Reagan nearly gave up U.S. nuclear arms when he met Gorbachev . What are the lessons for Trump ?
